about_the_game:
Help flightless bird Pip solve puzzles to reach the highest heights and see the top, in this heartfelt, uplifting quest.



  • A physics-driven, single-player adventure puzzle platformer with a touching story of determination
  • A colossal, world tree teeming with birds and puzzles
  • Logic-based difficulty, not all puzzles have a single solution to complete them
  • Over 1 hour of original music with beautiful orchestrated flute and catchy beats
  • Eggs

The task is simple - get to the top - but the various puzzles and traversal of the gigantic tree you call home may not be so straight-forward. You and your wits may be the answer to summitting the tree and proving everyone wrong.

Can you make it to the top of the tree?

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.13.6+
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.4GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 5000 (must support Metal API)
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS 10.14+
  • Processor: Quad Core 3.0 GHz+
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel UHD 630+ (must support Metal API)
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: A flightless bird named Pip wants to prove the world wrong and summit the top of the tree he calls home. Help Pip solve physics-based puzzles and navigate the tree's seemingly endless branches all the way up. Can you make it to the top of the tree?
